titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Paules-Crosse, vpon the 1. of Nouember, being All-Saints Day, anno 1607. By Sa: Collins, Batchelour in Diuinitie, and fellow of the Kings Colledge in Cambridge
titleStmt.author: Collins, Samuel, 1576-1651.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Humfrey Lownes, for Richard Bonian, dwelling at the signe of the spread Eagle, right ouer against the great north dore of S. Pauls Church,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the signe of the spread Eagle, right ouer against the great north dore of S. Pauls Church
